issue.title: [c++] Miss tests to verify expected_buffer with bit_width > 8 in RLE
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8506](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8506). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The current test cases only verify the encoded stream by RLE when bit_width <= 8. It is hard to verify whether the encoded stream by RLE keeps the data in a little-endian format
